snippet: Two employees of the New York State Assembly say the Assembly speaker, Sheldon Silver, worked with former Assemblyman Vito Lopez to hide allegations of wrongdoing.
abstract: New York State Assembly employees Victoria Burhans and Chloe Rivera file federal lawsuit against Assemblyman Vito J Lopez and Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver, claiming two worked together to hide Lopez's history of unwanted sexual advances toward women on his staff; also are suing the Assembly itself in state court.
lead_paragraph: Two employees of the New York State Assembly say the Assembly speaker, Sheldon Silver, worked with former Assemblyman Vito Lopez to hide allegations of wrongdoing.

headline.seo: Lawsuits Claim Silver Helped Lopez Hide Sexual Misconduct
headline.main: Suits Say Silver Helped Lopez Conceal Sexual Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Suits Say Silver Helped Lopez Conceal Sexual Misconduct
